Uninstalled after reaching 16384. This is a silly game. Once you realize how to score, you either play with the undo, which turns you into an almost zero brain activity machine, or you don't play with the undo, in which case the game is insanely frustrating. Moreover, it can become too addictive.

Interesting and addictive game! One of the problems of this game is that it 
depends a lot on luck! You can only decrease the chance of loosing but 
eventually you will loose because of luck! Creating 2048 is quite 
straight-forward but creating larger numbers is a little bit tricky! You 
should be ...Full ReviewInteresting and addictive game! One of the problems of this game is that it 
depends a lot on luck! You can only decrease the chance of loosing but 
eventually you will loose because of luck! Creating 2048 is quite 
straight-forward but creating larger numbers is a little bit tricky! You 
should be very lucky to create 16k or 32k! Creating larger number is 
impractical but theoretically you can create up to 128k!

I've been playing 5x5 mode. It's so much easier and the use of 5 undos 
makes it easier still. Kinda takes all the challenge away but it's a fun 
enough way to kill the time. I took 1 star off because it keeps asking me 
to rate it even though I already had.

Not much to say about this one since it's so simple. I like that there are different board sizes. I like that it gives you a personal high score-- those have kind of fallen out of fashion over the years and I really miss them. Overall, it's a nice little time-killer if you're into it, but it's not f...Full ReviewNot much to say about this one since it's so simple. I like that there are different board sizes. I like that it gives you a personal high score-- those have kind of fallen out of fashion over the years and I really miss them. Overall, it's a nice little time-killer if you're into it, but it's not for everybody. My advice? Try it out, play a couple rounds, and if you don't like it, toss it.
